text: Anil Panachooran (born P.U. Anilkumar 20 November 1965, Kayamkulam, Kerala, India) is a Malayalam film lyricist and poet. A lawyer by profession, Panachooran lives on the income from his lyrical and poetic work. == Filmography == === Lyrics === * Arabikkatha (2007) * Katha Parayumpol (2007) * Nazrani (2007) * Alibhai (2007) * Madampi (2008) * Cycle (2008) * Crazy Gopalan (2008) * Minnaminnikoottam (2008) * Mulla (2008) * Calendar (2009) * Daddy Cool * Bhramaram (2009) * Dhrona 2010 (2010) * Cocktail (2010) * Chekavar (2010) * Marykkundoru Kunjaadu (2010) * Note Out (2011) * Arjunan Saakshi * China Town * Seniors * Sevenes (2011) * Spanish Masala (2011) * Black Ticket (2012) * Yathra Chodikkathe (2015) * Velipadinte Pusthakam (2017) === Singer === * Arabikkatha (2007) === Actor === * Arabikkatha (2007) * Manikyakkallu (2011) * Chila Neram Chila Munushar (2011) * Yathra Chodikkathe (2015) == References == == External links == * Category:Living people Category:Malayali people Category:People from Alappuzha district Category:Malayalam-language lyricists Category:1965 births Category:Male actors from Kerala Category:Film musicians from Kerala Category:Singers from Kerala Category:21st-century Indian singers Category:21st-century Indian male actors Category:Male actors in Malayalam cinema Category:Indian male film actors Category:21st-century Indian composers
title: Anil Panachooran
